member.summary: Represents a bullet graph.

member.summary: Cleanup resources allocated by the view.

member.summary: Gets the resolved maximum value of the scale.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.ActualMinimumValue
member.summary: Gets the resolved minimum value of the scale.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.Animating
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the bullet graph is currently animating.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.BackingBrush
member.summary: Gets or sets the brush to use to fill the backing of the bullet graph.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.BackingInnerExtent
member.summary: Gets or sets the inner extent of the bullet graph backing.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.BackingOuterExtent
member.summary: Gets or sets the outer extent of the bullet graph backing.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.BackingOutline
member.summary: Gets or sets the brush to use for the outline of the backing.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.BackingStrokeThickness
member.summary: Gets or sets the stroke thickness of the backing outline.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.Font
member.summary: Returns or sets the font for the text.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.FontBrush
member.summary: Gets or sets the brush to use for the label font.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.FontFamily
member.summary: Returns or sets the font family for the text.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.FontSize
member.summary: Returns or sets the font size for the text.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.FontStyle
member.summary: Returns or sets the font style for the text.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.Interval
member.summary: Gets or sets the interval to use for the scale.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.IsScaleInverted
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the scale is inverted. When the scale is inverted the direction in which the scale values increase is right to left.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.LabelExtent
member.summary: Gets or sets the position at which to put the labels as a value from 0 to 1, measured from the bottom of the scale. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to hide the labels of the bullet graph.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.LabelInterval
member.summary: Gets or sets the interval to use for rendering labels. This defaults to be the same interval as the tickmarks on the scale.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.LabelsPostInitial
member.summary: A value to start adding labels, added to the scale's MinimumValue.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.LabelsPreTerminal
member.summary: A value to stop adding labels, subtracted from the scale's MaximumValue.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.MaximumValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum value of the scale.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.MinimumValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum value of the scale.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.MinorTickBrush
member.summary: Gets or sets the brush to use for the minor tickmarks.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.MinorTickCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of minor tickmarks to place between major tickmarks.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.MinorTickEndExtent
member.summary: Gets or sets the position at which to stop rendering the minor tickmarks as a value from 0 to 1, measured from the front/bottom of the bullet graph. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the bullet graph.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.MinorTickStartExtent
member.summary: Gets or sets the position at which to start rendering the minor tickmarks as a value from 0 to 1, measured from the front/bottom of the bullet graph. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the bullet graph.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.MinorTickStrokeThickness
member.summary: Gets or sets the stroke thickness to use when rendering minor ticks.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.Orientation
member.summary: Gets or sets the orientation of the scale.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.PixelScalingRatio
member.summary: Gets or sets the scaling value used to affect the pixel density of the control.
member.remarks: A higher scaling ratio will produce crisper visuals at the expense of memory. Lower values will cause the control to appear blurry.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.RangeBrushes
member.summary: Gets or sets a collection of brushes to be used as the palette for bullet graph ranges.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.RangeInnerExtent
member.summary: Gets or sets the position at which to start rendering the ranges, measured from the front/bottom of the control as a value from 0 to 1. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the bullet graph.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.RangeOuterExtent
member.summary: Gets or sets the position at which to stop rendering the range as a value from 0 to 1 measured from the front/bottom of the bullet graph. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the bullet graph.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.RangeOutlines
member.summary: Gets or sets a collection of brushes to be used as the palette for bullet graph outlines.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.Ranges
member.summary: Gets or sets the scale ranges to render on the bullet graph.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.ScaleBackgroundBrush
member.summary: Gets or sets the background brush for the scale.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.ScaleBackgroundOutline
member.summary: Gets or sets the background outline for the scale.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.ScaleBackgroundThickness
member.summary: Gets or sets the background outline thickness for the scale.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.ScaleEndExtent
member.summary: Gets or sets the position at which to stop rendering the scale as a value from 0 to 1, measured from the front/bottom of the bullet graph. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the bullet graph.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.ScaleStartExtent
member.summary: Gets or sets the position at which to start rendering the scale, measured from the front/bottom of the bullet graph as a value from 0 to 1. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the bullet graph.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.TargetValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the value indicated by the target value bar.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.TargetValueBreadth
member.summary: Get or sets the breadth of the target value element.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.TargetValueBrush
member.summary: Gets or sets the brush to use when rendering the fill of the comparative marker.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.TargetValueInnerExtent
member.summary: Gets or sets the position at which to start rendering the target value, measured from the front/bottom of the control as a value from 0 to 1. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the bullet graph.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.TargetValueOuterExtent
member.summary: Gets or sets the position at which to start rendering the target value, measured from the front/bottom of the control as a value from 0 to 1. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the bullet graph.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.TargetValueOutline
member.summary: Gets or sets the brush to use when rendering the outline of the target value.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.TargetValueStrokeThickness
member.summary: Gets or sets the stroke thickness of the outline of the target value bar.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.TickBrush
member.summary: Gets or sets the brush to use for the major tickmarks.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.TickEndExtent
member.summary: Gets or sets the position at which to stop rendering the major tickmarks as a value from 0 to 1, measured from the front/bottom of the bullet graph. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the bullet graph.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.TicksPostInitial
member.summary: A value to start adding tickmarks, added to the scale's MinimumValue.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.TicksPreTerminal
member.summary: A value to stop adding tickmarks, subtracted from the scale's MaximumValue.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.TickStartExtent
member.summary: Gets or sets the position at which to start rendering the major tickmarks as a value from 0 to 1, measured from the front/bottom of the bullet graph. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the bullet graph.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.TickStrokeThickness
member.summary: Gets or sets the stroke thickness to use when rendering ticks.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.TransitionDuration
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of milliseconds over which changes to the bullet graph should be animated.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.TransitionProgress
member.summary: Gets the transition progress of the animation when the control is animating.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the value at which the bar ends.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.ValueBrush
member.summary: Gets or sets the brush to use for the actual value element.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.ValueInnerExtent
member.summary: Gets or sets the position at which to start rendering the actual value geometries, measured from the front/bottom of the bullet graph as a value from 0 to 1. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the bullet graph.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.ValueOuterExtent
member.summary: Gets or sets the position at which to stop rendering the actual value geometries as a value from 0 to 1 measured from the front/bottom of the bullet graph. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the bullet graph.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.ValueOutline
member.summary: Gets or sets the brush to use for the outline of actual value element.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.ValueStrokeThickness
member.summary: Gets or sets the stroke thickness to use when rendering single actual value element.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.ExportSerializedVisualData
member.summary: Returns visuals as a serialized string.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.ExportVisualData
member.summary: Exports visual information about the control for use by external tools and functionality.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.Flush
member.summary: Use to force the bullet graph to finish any deferred work before printing or evaluating its visual.
member.remarks: This should only be called if the visual of the bullet graph needs to be synchronously saved or evaluated. Calling this method too often will hinder the performance of the bullet graph.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.GetValueForPoint(Infragistics.Core.Point)
member.summary: Gets the value for the main scale of the bullet graph for a given point within the bounds of the bullet graph.
member.param: The point for which to retrieve the associated value.
member.returns: The value on the bullet graph equating to the desired point.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.BulletGraphView.OnPropertyChanged(System.String)
member.summary: Used to raise the PropertyChanged event when a property of the object has been changed.
member.param: The name of the property that was changed

member.summary: Used to invoke the event.

member.summary: Event which is raised when a label of the bullet graph is aligned along the scale.

member.summary: Event which is raised when a label of the bullet graph is formatted.

member.summary: Invoked when a property of the object has been changed.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.LinearGaugeView.ScaleInnerExtent
member.summary: Gets or sets the position at which to start rendering the scale, measured from the bottom/front (when orientation is horizontal/vertical) of the control as a value from 0 to 1. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the linear gauge.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.LinearGaugeView.ScaleOuterExtent
member.summary: Gets or sets the position at which to stop rendering the scale as a value from 0 to 1 measured from the bottom/front (when orientation is horizontal/vertical) of the linear gauge. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the linear gauge.

member.summary: Gets or sets the position at which to start rendering the scale, measured from the front/bottom of the linear gauge as a value from 0 to 1. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the linear gauge.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.LinearGaugeView.ScaleStrokeThickness
member.summary: Gets or sets the stroke thickness of the scale outline.

member.summary: Gets or sets the brush to use for the major tickmarks.

member.summary: Gets or sets the position at which to stop rendering the major tickmarks as a value from 0 to 1, measured from the front/bottom of the linear gauge. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the linear gauge.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.LinearGaugeView.TicksPostInitial
member.summary: A value to start adding tickmarks, added to the scale's MinimumValue.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.LinearGaugeView.TicksPreTerminal
member.summary: A value to stop adding tickmarks, subtracted from the scale's MaximumValue.

member.summary: Gets or sets the position at which to start rendering the major tickmarks as a value from 0 to 1, measured from the front/bottom of the linear gauge. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the linear gauge.

member.summary: Gets or sets the number of milliseconds over which changes to the linear gauge should be animated.

member.summary: Gets the transition progress of the animation when the control is animating.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.LinearGaugeView.ExportSerializedVisualData
member.summary: Returns visuals as a serialized string.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.LinearGaugeView.ExportVisualData
member.summary: Exports visual information about the control for use by external tools and functionality.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.LinearGaugeView.Flush
member.summary: Use to force the linear gauge to finish any deferred work before printing or evaluating its visual.
member.remarks: This should only be called if the visual of the linear gauge needs to be synchronously saved or evaluated. Calling this method too often will hinder the performance of the linear gauge.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.LinearGaugeView.GetValueForPoint(Infragistics.Core.Point)
member.summary: Gets the value for the main scale of the gauge for a given point within the bounds of the gauge.
member.param: The point for which to retrieve the associated value.
member.returns: The value on the gauge equating to the desired point.

member.summary: Gets or sets the value at which the range ends along the scale.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.LinearGraphRange.InnerEndExtent
member.summary: Gets or sets the distance measured from the front/bottom of the bullet graph (from 0 to 1) at which to end rendering the inner edge of the range. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal width/height of the bullet graph.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.LinearGraphRange.InnerStartExtent
member.summary: Gets or sets the distance measured from the front/bottom of the bullet graph (from 0 to 1) at which to start rendering the inner edge of the range. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal width/height of the bullet graph.

member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the range.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.LinearGraphRange.OuterEndExtent
member.summary: Gets or sets the distance measured from the front/bottom of the bullet graph (from 0 to 1) at which to end rendering the outer edge of the range. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal width/height of the bullet graph.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.LinearGraphRange.OuterStartExtent
member.summary: Gets or sets the distance measured from the front/bottom of the bullet graph (from 0 to 1) at which to start rendering the outer edge of the range. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal width/height of the bullet graph.

member.summary: Gets or sets the outline to use when rendering the range.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.LinearGraphRange.StartValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the value at which the range starts along the scale.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.LinearGraphRange.StrokeThickness
member.summary: Gets or sets the stroke thickness to use when rendering this range's outline.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeRange.OuterStartExtent
member.summary: Gets or sets the distance from the center of the gauge (from 0 to 1) at which to start rendering the outer sweep of the range. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal radius of the gauge.

member.summary: A radial gauge for displaying a single value on a defined scale.

member.summary: Initializes a new .

member.summary: Initializes a new .

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.ActualMaximumValue
member.summary: Gets the resolved maximum value of the scale.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.ActualMinimumValue
member.summary: Gets the resolved minimum value of the scale.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.ActualPixelScalingRatio
member.summary: Gets or sets the actual scaling value used by the main canvas rendering context to apply a scale transform to it.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.Animating
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the radial gauge is currently animating.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.BackingBrush
member.summary: Gets or sets the brush to use to fill the backing of the gauge.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.BackingCornerRadius
member.summary: Gets or sets the corner rounding radius to use for the fitted scale backings.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.BackingInnerExtent
member.summary: Gets or sets the inner extent of the gauge backing.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.BackingOuterExtent
member.summary: Gets or sets the outer extent of the gauge backing.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.BackingOutline
member.summary: Gets or sets the brush to use for the outline of the backing.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.BackingOversweep
member.summary: Gets or sets the over sweep angle to apply to the backing if it is displaying fitted (in degrees). Must be greater or equal to 0.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.BackingShape
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of shape to use for the backing of the gauge.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.BackingStrokeThickness
member.summary: Gets or sets the stroke thickness of the backing outline.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.CenterX
member.summary: Gets or sets the x position of the center of the gauge with the value ranging from 0 to 1.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.CenterY
member.summary: Gets or sets the y position of the center of the gauge with the value ranging from 0 to 1.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.DuplicateLabelOmissionStrategy
member.summary: Gets or sets the strategy to use for omitting labels if the first and last label have the same value.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.Font
member.summary: Returns or sets the font for the text.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.FontBrush
member.summary: Gets or sets the brush to use for the label font.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.FontFamily
member.summary: Returns or sets the font family for the text.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.FontSize
member.summary: Returns or sets the font size for the text.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.FontStyle
member.summary: Returns or sets the font style for the text.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.Interval
member.summary: Gets or sets the interval to use for the scale.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.IsNeedleDraggingConstrained
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the needle is constrained within the minimum and maximum value range during dragging.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.IsNeedleDraggingEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets whether needle dragging is enabled or not.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.LabelExtent
member.summary: Gets or sets the position at which to put the labels as a value from 0 to 1, measured form the center of the gauge. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal radius of the gauge.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.LabelInterval
member.summary: Gets or sets the interval to use for rendering labels. This defaults to be the same interval as the tickmarks on the scale.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.MaximumValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum value of the scale.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.MinimumValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum value of the scale.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.MinorTickBrush
member.summary: Gets or sets the brush to use for the minor tickmarks.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.MinorTickCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of minor tickmarks to place between major tickmarks.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.MinorTickEndExtent
member.summary: Gets or sets the position at which to stop rendering the minor tickmarks as a value from 0 to 1, measured from the center of the gauge. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal radius of the gauge.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.MinorTickStartExtent
member.summary: Gets or sets the position at which to start rendering the minor tickmarks as a value from 0 to 1, measured from the center of the gauge. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal radius of the gauge.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.MinorTickStrokeThickness
member.summary: Gets or sets the stroke thickness to use when rendering minor ticks.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.NeedleBaseFeatureExtent
member.summary: Gets or sets the extent of the feature which is closest to the base (e.g. a bulb) with a value from -1 to 1. Note: Only some needle shapes respect this property, namely: NeedleWithBulb, RectangleWithBulb, TrapezoidWithBulb, and TriangleWithBulb. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal radius of the gauge.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.NeedleBaseFeatureWidthRatio
member.summary: Gets or sets the width of the needle at its feature which is closest to the base (e.g. a bulb) with a value from 0 to 1. Note: Only some needle shapes respect this property, namely: NeedleWithBulb, RectangleWithBulb, TrapezoidWithBulb, and TriangleWithBulb. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal radius of the gauge.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.NeedleBrush
member.summary: Gets or sets the brush to use when rendering the fill of the needle.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.NeedleEndExtent
member.summary: Gets or sets the extent (from -1 to 1) at which to end rendering the needle, measured from the center of the gauge. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal radius of the gauge.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.NeedleEndWidthRatio
member.summary: Gets or sets the width of the needle at its point using a value from (0 to 1). Note: Only some needle shapes respect this property. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal radius of the gauge.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.NeedleOutline
member.summary: Gets or sets the brush to use when rendering the outline of the needle.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.NeedlePivotBrush
member.summary: Gets or sets the brush to use for filling the needle cap. Note: this only applies to certain cap shapes.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.NeedlePivotInnerWidthRatio
member.summary: Gets or sets the width of the inner cutout section of the needle cap with a value from 0 to 1. Note: Will only take effect if you have a cap set on the needle that has a cutout section.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.NeedlePivotOutline
member.summary: Gets or sets the brush to use for the outlines of the needle cap.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.NeedlePivotShape
member.summary: Gets or sets the shape to use for the needle cap.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.NeedlePivotStrokeThickness
member.summary: Gets or sets the stroke thickness to use for the outline of the needle cap.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.NeedlePivotWidthRatio
member.summary: Gets or sets the width of the cap of the needle with a value from 0 to 1. Note: Will only take effect if you have a cap set on the needle. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal radius of the gauge.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.NeedlePointFeatureExtent
member.summary: Gets or sets the extent of the feature which is closest to the point (e.g. the tapering point of a needle) with a value from -1 to 1. Note: Only some needle shapes respect this property. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal radius of the gauge.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.NeedlePointFeatureWidthRatio
member.summary: Gets or sets the width of the needle at its feature which is closest to the point (e.g. the tapering point of a needle) with a value from 0 to 1. Note: Only some needle shapes respect this property. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal radius of the gauge.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.NeedleShape
member.summary: Gets or sets the shape to use when rendering the needle from a number of options.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.NeedleStartExtent
member.summary: Gets or sets the extent (from -1 to 1) at which to start rendering the needle, measured from the center of the gauge. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal radius of the gauge.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.NeedleStartWidthRatio
member.summary: Gets or sets the width of the needle at its point using a value from (0 to 1). Note: Only some needle shapes respect this property. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal radius of the gauge.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.NeedleStrokeThickness
member.summary: Gets or sets the stroke thickness of the needle outline.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.PixelScalingRatio
member.summary: Gets or sets the scaling value used to affect the pixel density of the control.
member.remarks: A higher scaling ratio will produce crisper visuals at the expense of memory. Lower values will cause the control to appear blurry.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.RadiusMultiplier
member.summary: Gets or sets the multiplying factor to apply to the normal radius of the gauge. The radius of the gauge is defined by the minimum of the width and height of the control divided by 2.0. This introduces a multiplicative factor to that value.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.RangeBrushes
member.summary: Gets or sets a collection of brushes to be used as the palette for gauge ranges.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.RangeOutlines
member.summary: Gets or sets a collection of brushes to be used as the palette for gauge outlines.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.Ranges
member.summary: Gets or sets the ranges to render on the gauge.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.ScaleBrush
member.summary: Gets or sets the brush to use to fill the background of the scale.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.ScaleEndAngle
member.summary: Gets or sets the end angle for the scale in degrees.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.ScaleEndExtent
member.summary: Gets or sets the position at which to stop rendering the scale as a value from 0 to 1 measured from the center of the gauge. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal radius of the gauge.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.ScaleOversweep
member.summary: Gets or sets the extra degrees of sweep to apply to the scale background. Must be greater or equal to 0.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.ScaleOversweepShape
member.summary: Gets or sets the oversweep shape to use for the excess fill area for the scale.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.ScaleStartAngle
member.summary: Gets or sets the start angle for the scale in degrees.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.ScaleStartExtent
member.summary: Gets or sets the position at which to start rendering the scale, measured from the center of the gauge as a value from 0 to 1. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal radius of the gauge.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.ScaleSweepDirection
member.summary: Gets or sets the direction in which the scale sweeps around the center from the start angle to end angle.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.TickBrush
member.summary: Gets or sets the brush to use for the major tickmarks.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.TickEndExtent
member.summary: Gets or sets the position at which to stop rendering the major tickmarks as a value from 0 to 1, measured from the center of the gauge. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal radius of the gauge.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.TickStartExtent
member.summary: Gets or sets the position at which to start rendering the major tickmarks as a value from 0 to 1, measured from the center of the gauge. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal radius of the gauge.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.TickStrokeThickness
member.summary: Gets or sets the stroke thickness to use when rendering ticks.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.TransitionDuration
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of milliseconds over which changes to the gauge should be animated.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.TransitionEasingFunction
member.summary:
Gets or sets the easing function used to morph the current series.
This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.TransitionProgress
member.summary: Gets the transition progress of the animation when the control is animating.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the value at which to point the needle of the gauge.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.ExportSerializedVisualData
member.summary: Returns visuals as a serialized string.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.ExportVisualData
member.summary: Exports visual information about the control for use by external tools and functionality.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.Flush
member.summary: Use to force the radial gauge to finish any deferred work before printing or evaluating its visual.
member.remarks: This should only be called if the visual of the radial gauge needs to be synchronously saved or evaluated. Calling this method too often will hinder the performance of the radial gauge.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.GetPointForValue(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Gets the point on the gauge for a given scale value and extent.
member.param: The value of the gauge's scale.
member.returns: Point that corresponds to a given value and extent.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.GetValueForPoint(Infragistics.Core.Point)
member.summary: Gets the value for the main scale of the gauge for a given point within the bounds of the gauge.
member.param: The point for which to retrieve the associated value.
member.returns: The value on the gauge equating to the desired point.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.NeedleContainsPoint(Infragistics.Core.Point)
member.summary: Returns true if the main gauge needle bounding box contains the point provided, otherwise false.
member.returns: True if the needles bounding box contains the point

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.NeedleContainsPoint(Infragistics.Core.Point,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns true if the main gauge needle bounding box contains the point provided, otherwise false.
member.param: Should it use the bounding container designed for touch?
member.returns: True if the needles bounding box contains the point

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.OnPropertyChanged(System.String)
member.summary: Used to raise the PropertyChanged event when a property of the object has been changed.
member.param: The name of the property that was changed

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.ScaleValue(System.Double)
member.summary: Scales a value on the gauge's main scale to an angle around the center point of the gauge, in radians.
member.returns: The angle for the value in radians.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.UnscaleValue(System.Double)
member.summary: Unscales a value from an angle in radians to the represented value along the main scale of the gauge.
member.param: The angle in radians to unscale to a value.
member.returns: The unscaled value on the gauge's main scale.

member.summary: Used to invoke the event.

member.summary: Event which is raised when a label of the gauge is aligned along the scale.

member.summary: Used to invoke the event.

member.name: E:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.RadialGaugeView.FormatLabel
member.summary: Event which is raised when a label of the gauge is formatted.

member.summary: Invoked when a property of the object has been changed.

member.summary: Occurs when the Value property changes.

member.summary: Draw the view.

member.summary: Returns a minimum size that fits within the provided space.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.TitlesPosition
member.summary: Enum specifying the position of the titles relative to scale's start/end.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.TitlesPosition.ScaleStart
member.summary: The titles are placed at scale's start (minimum value).

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.TitlesPosition.ScaleEnd
